blogPost.excerpt: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
blogPost.body: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
blogPost.title: La Touche Musicale - You can learn piano online easily with the songs you love
blogPost.author: Joris Astier

localize.description: 无需钢琴谱的直观方法 不再需要知道如何解读钢琴谱或了解乐理。在几秒钟内，你就能认出要在键盘上演奏的音符。超过1,000首各种风格和技巧水平的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 你可以用你喜欢的歌曲轻松地在网上学习钢琴。

localize.description: 無需鋼琴譜的直觀方法 不再需要知道如何解讀鋼琴譜或瞭解樂理。在幾秒鐘內，你就能認出要在鍵盤上演奏的音符。超過1,000首各種風格和技巧水平的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 你可以用你喜歡的歌曲輕鬆地在網上學習鋼琴。

previous.excerpt: Rows combines the power of a spreadsheet with built-in integrations with your business apps. No scripts. No plugins. Automate workflows, analyze data, share dashboards, and build forms and tools that make work simpler. Then, share them as beautiful web apps!
previous.title: Rows beta - The spreadsheet where teams work faster

localize.description: Rows结合了电子表格的强大功能，并与您的业务应用程序进行了内置集成。没有脚本。没有插件。自动化工作流程，分析数据，共享仪表盘，并建立表单和工具，使工作更简单。然后，将它们作为漂亮的网络应用程序进行分享
localize.tagline: 团队工作更快的电子表格

localize.description: Rows結合了電子表格的強大功能，並與您的業務應用程序進行了內置集成。沒有腳本。沒有插件。自動化工作流程，分析數據，共享儀表盤，並建立表單和工具，使工作更簡單。然後，將它們作爲漂亮的網絡應用程序進行分享
localize.tagline: 團隊工作更快的電子表格
